outline.title: The $40B Problem
outline.summary: Youth sports spending crisis - parents spending $3K-$35K/year, 83% believe kids will play college but only 7% do

outline.title: Our Solution
outline.summary: ATHLYNX one platform for entire athlete journey - AI NIL valuation, transfer portal, recruiting, content generation

outline.title: Market Opportunity

outline.summary: Multiple revenue streams - subscriptions, brand partnerships, university licenses, transaction fees, hosting
